header.aboutMe: Innovative assassin in the brotherhood, professional stealth taker, and very good with woman.

duties: Developed and executed a strategic plan to liberate Rome from Borgia control.
Coordinated with allies to weaken the Templar influence in the region.
Led the Brotherhood in the Italian Renaissance, mentoring and training new recruits.
Orchestrated successful missions against high-profile Templar targets.

education.description: Learned the ways of the Assassin through self-discipline, observation, and guidance from skilled mentors.
